infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_sl: The heavy anti-materiel rifle used by Bai Ye fires ||color:0,200,0,255||20mm high-explosive armor-piercing rounds||color:end|| It has an extremely heavy barrel and possesses the immense power to easily shatter any armor. It is unknown what kind of target it was designed for.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mg42: A heavy machine gun banned by the Europa Convention, its terrifying rate of fire and sound have been dubbed the "dictator's chainsaw" since Earth's time. Using a ‖color:0,200,0,255‖7.92 MG42 drum‖color:end‖, its extreme muzzle velocity and penetration make any enemy cover laughable. The only downside is its poor sustained fire capability.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_56: Lightweight, accurate, and reliable. It uses a gas-operated system and can fire single shots, using ‖color:0,200,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ bullets. No need for a soft burial place, life is green mountains everywhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_81: A well-performing weapon with good accuracy, reliable operation, and easy maintenance, this relic performs well in combat, using ‖color:0,200,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ bullets.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_m1: A classic firearm from Old Earth, chambered for the ‖color:0,200,0,255‖M1 Garand En Bloc Clip‖color:end‖. It emits its iconic, satisfying ping when the last round is fired. Though semi-automatic, its full-power cartridges deliver formidable suppressive fire. However, insufficient weapon handling skills will result in painful finger pinches during reloads.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_vk: A beautifully designed white modified submachine gun that can be equipped with pistol sights and a suppressor. It uses a ‖color:0,200,0,255‖submachine gun magazine (.45)‖color:end‖, boasting an astonishing rate of fire and almost no recoil. However, it was not adopted by the military due to its unsuitability for submarine warfare and is only sold in limited quantities as a collector's item within TSM.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_js9: A ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ caliber suppressed submachine gun with a bullpup design, the magazine is located behind the pistol grip to shorten the weapon's length, and it usually has a suppressor installed; it uses a blowback-operated system.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mp5sd: Uses a ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ submachine gun magazine, improved from the standard submachine gun used by the Coalition to a suppressed version, more popular among security officers everywhere, with high shooting accuracy and compact structure, the classic locking mechanism makes it extra reliable.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_apc9: A low-caliber weapon designed specifically for critical infrastructure protection. It is compatible with ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9mm Submachine Gun Magazine‖color:end‖ and ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9mm Pistol Magazine‖color:end‖. Its small-caliber ammunition minimizes damage to vital facilities like reactors during firefights, while its high rate of fire and excellent mobility deliver sufficient suppressive power. The highly modular design also allows for versatile tactical configurations. Recruit Engineer Lin Heyin to unlock the crafting recipe.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_apc9tsm_ar57: A unique AR-platform weapon built to capitalize on the exceptional performance of ‖color:0,200,0,255‖5.7×28mm Ammunition‖color:end‖. Its original magazine well has been converted into an ejection port, and empty casings can be collected when fitted with a shell-catch bag. The AR platform also supports a wide array of tactical attachments, making it a favorite among many professional security personnel. Recruit Doctor Khalid to unlock the crafting recipe.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_79_smg: Uses a ‖color:0,200,0,255‖.45 caliber‖color:end‖ submachine gun magazine.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_9_smgmag_cj: Loaded with 30 rounds of 9mm armor-piercing bullets.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_57_smgmag: The heavy magazine can hold 50 rounds. The 5.7*28 caliber ammunition can easily penetrate body armor with level 3, 4, or even 5 protection capabilities.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_46_smgmag: Loaded with 35 rounds of 4.6*30 caliber bullets. Designed to minimize weight and recoil while maximizing penetration against body armor. It features a bottlenecked case with a pointed, steel-core, copper-jacketed projectile.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_45_smgmag: Loaded with 25 rounds of .45 caliber bullets. The advantage of this ammunition lies in its strong stopping power and penetration.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_45_smgmag_kr: Loaded with 40 rounds of .45 caliber bullets. Although the .45 ACP bullets have significant recoil, design optimizations such as closed-bolt operation and rate reducers effectively control shooting accuracy and recoil, enhancing shooting stability.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_45_smgmag_durm: The .45 C-Mag dual-drum magazine is a bulky drum that can hold 70 rounds of .45-caliber ammunition and can be reloaded using an ammunition box. However, it is simply too cumbersome and inconvenient, stripping the submachine gun of its inherent portability and failing to win the favor of shooters. There are also rumors that it was taken off the shelves due to complaints from parents because of its supposedly uncivilized appearance, which is nothing but a sensational claim.‌
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_9_mag: Loaded with 18 rounds of 9mm pistol ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_9_krmag: The heavy magazine can hold 33 rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_9_drum: Loaded with 50 rounds of 9mm ammunition, currently compatible with Glock 18.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_1143_mag: Loaded with 12 rounds of the century-old .45 ACP caliber ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_127_mag: Loaded with 7 rounds of high-power pistol ammunition. Due to its large size, the number of magazines carried will be affected.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mg42_mag: Loaded with 75 rounds of large-caliber bullets.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep: TSM Kinetic Penetrator Can fire harpoon ammunition and spears. Can be equipped with a San ShenQiu-specific battery for enhanced performance. 'You're wrong. Our fallen brothers are not standing pines, but graves that refuse to fall.'
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Wine is a poison to the gut‖color:end‖ Kinetic Penetrator piercing spear ammunition, with an extremely sharp tip capable of penetrating some walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_he: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Fire is like thunder and lightning‖color:end‖ Kinetic Penetrator high-explosive spear ammunition, with a small area of explosion damage. Beware of friendly fire!
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_12: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Color is like a steel knife‖color:end‖ Kinetic Penetrator shotgun spear ammunition, which can fire multiple projectiles, causing widespread damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_heat: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Wealth is the root of trouble‖color:end‖ Kinetic Penetrator grenade spear ammunition, with a larger explosion range and a minimum arming distance.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_kep_battery: Provides ‖color:255,100,100,255‖San ShenQiu‖color:end‖ with powerful energy, increasing the rate of fire and kinetic energy of shots.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_redemption: Energy Emitter Uses energy restraint boxes as ammunition. Features two modes that can be switched according to the environment. Contributed by Crazy Thursday.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_redemption_Restrai: Energy is restrained in this small box using [classified] methods. When paired with a specific emitter, the box can effectively unleash the energy's potential.
infotexts.npctitle.tsm_outpost_combat_npc_a: TSM Advanced Ops Department Field Agent
infotexts.npctitle.tsm_outpost_combat_npc_j: TSM Jiuzhou Ops Department Field Agent
infotexts.npctitle.yehuo_leader: Rebel Leader of the Wildfire Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.yehuo: Assault Trooper of the Wildfire Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.yehuo_p: Assault Trooper of the Wildfire Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.yehuo_ex: Demolition Expert of the Wildfire Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.fkj_elite: Elite NCO Cadet of the Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.fkj_elite_p: Elite NCO Cadet of the Resistance
infotexts.npctitle.yehuo_reinforcement: Warhammer Support Squad of the Wildfire Resistance
infotexts.tsm_combat_tsm_event.1: Cat Consultant calling TSM, T-31-s emergency! T-31-s emergency! Requesting reinforcements
infotexts.tsm_combat_tsm_event.2: Hold on, Advisor. The Chief Instructor has sent us to bring you all home
infotexts.tsm_combat_occupation_event.1: The situation is not good. The nearby rapid response forces are moving towards this station. We need to speed up
infotexts.tsm_combat_beowulf_event.1: Damn it, we intercepted a message from Beowulf Squadron. They called for reinforcements. The alliance's nearest rapid response forces are on their way. We need to speed up
infotexts.tsm_combat_yehuo_event.1: Wildfire calling Warhammer Support Squad, we have made contact with the enemy and need reinforcements! Need reinforcements!
infotexts.tsm_darkstormynight.2: It doesn't seem like a good omen. Today is not a good day to die
infotexts.tsm_darkstormynight.3: It's time for a real gunfight
infotexts.tsm_combat_adventists_event_tsm.1: T.S.M Site 2 Raiding Squad: Arrived at the designated position, beginning the assault.\n\nAdventist Leader: What fools, daring to come to us. Bring out our modified machines!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_qrf: The Coalition's Rapid Response Force is deploying at this abandoned site, preparing to raid a nearby hostile site. However, the nearby sites will not sit idly by. This is your moment to earn glory. Clear out all the rapid response forces and destroy the reactor!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_qrf: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_qrf: ???: Nice work. This operation has dealt a heavy blow to the Coalition's morale. The money has been deposited into your account. Remember, no one gave you orders. This was your doing.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_beowulf: Beowulf was initially established jointly by the Coalition and TSM as a riot control and counter-terrorism unit. Since the separatists declared war, this unit's responsibilities have far exceeded traditional riot control and have been granted higher authority. However, during one incident, their actions spiraled out of control, leading to the death of numerous hostages. This tragedy not only sparked public outrage but also placed their captain on the Coalition's most-wanted list. Now is the time to strike while they are vulnerable, Captain! Capture this site and destroy the reactor. Courage and glory will be yours!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_beowulf: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_beowulf: Countless challengers thrust their blades deep into the dragon's belly, killing it. As the dragon lay dying, it finally remembered its name—Beowulf.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_occupation: The Coalition's occupying forces, known for their heavy armor and firepower, have implemented a full military lockdown of the area. Per the latest orders from the separatists' command headquarters: our mission is to completely eliminate all enemy forces in the area and destroy the reactor, clearing a safe path for our main forces. All ship commanders, please ensure your vessels are fully prepared for combat before engaging the enemy.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_occupation: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_occupation: The occupying forces watched helplessly as they were consumed by the reactor's explosion. Meanwhile, within another site, separatists and Coalition soldiers continued to fight. The light and heat from the reactor explosion reached them as well, and they watched the same flash slowly fade away. All of this began with politicians standing on opposing platforms, hurling insults at each other. A verbal duel turned into a bloody war. Outsiders wished to tear apart the opposing factions, while the true participants just wanted to go home.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_coalition: A small group of Coalition soldiers is active in this area. Considering the previous declaration of war between the separatists and the Coalition, they will not welcome your presence. If you wish to maintain good relations with the Coalition, it is better not to get involved.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_coalition: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_coalition: Separatists Liaison: We are pleased that the Captain has chosen the path of righteousness.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_separatist: The local residents oppose the Coalition forces stationed at [location1]. After the Coalition forces withdrew, the separatists quietly infiltrated the site. As the maintainers of order on Europa, we cannot tolerate such actions by the enemy. Captain, raid this site, eliminate their leader, and show the separatists who the true enforcers are.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_separatists: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_separatists: Coalition Liaison: Captain, do not let up after this. We have more battles to fight.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Urgent report from the combat zone command: armed uprisings in multiple locations have drawn the attention of the Coalition's high command. It has been confirmed that the separatists' elite "Sharp Raiders" have established a stronghold at [location1], intending to raid surrounding facilities. The objective this time is to eliminate all raiders and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Coalition Liaison: Captain, the admiral has received our victorious news and commended us. Meanwhile, we have also interrogated the mastermind behind this separatists' "uprising"—General Victoria Pedran. It is time to plan for the next operation.
infotexts.missionname.tsm_combat_yehuo: Wildfire - The Last Blooming Red Flower
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_yehuo: In an effort to weaken the Coalition's dominance in this sea area, the Wildfire separatists launched a surprise attack and annihilated the Coalition garrison at [location1]. According to reconnaissance intelligence, after successfully capturing most of the area's strongholds, the separatists are now massing their forces to launch a final assault. Mission objective: eliminate all separatists and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_yehuo: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_yehuo: The last separatist member fell, shouting before dying, "We will burn like wildfire, and one day we will consume the Coalition completely!" What do people truly seek, and for what purpose? They fight each other—does the bloodshed serve to make the flowers bloom?
infotexts.tsm_haulagecombat_1.c1: There's an urgent commission here. Our cooperation with them hinges on this. A group of overconfident vermin thinks they can bite off more than they can chew. If you're willing to take it on, the reward will definitely be worth it.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_haulagecombat_1: A group of blind-sided pirates has stolen a batch of data modules containing personal privacy. I don't want these to be sold openly. Either they die or they disappear with the items (Note: The ship's hull is invincible and cannot be broken, so please board freely, but be aware of the slow-firing cannons on the ship.)
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Disappointing, but I suppose the black market will find more suitable partners than you.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Time to throw them overboard to the fish.
infotexts.missionmessage1.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Those who pry into secrets have paid the price. Now, we can discuss other collaborations.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_crosstalk:
Calling Turquoise, Turquoise, come in!
Damn it, they've jammed our signals. Wait, a submarine is docking.
..........
Where have you guys been? We need reinforcements!
This is TSM Advanced Operations Department, preparing to intercept.
Drive these Coalition dogs out of our territory!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Report: All personnel killed in action.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Thank you, Captain, for dealing with the Coalition's interference squad. Rest assured, we will not disclose any information about you.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_escort: A fully armed Coalition squad needs to board your ship to head to the next station, but they don't seem very legitimate. Be cautious.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsm_combat_escort: The Coalition's bandits deserve to be thrown into the abyss to feed the fish.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_escort: The ship has been requisitioned for military use.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_escort: You Coalition dogs, get off my ship!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_aria:
Previously, we identified a site conducting human control experiments by the Adventists. After we sent a squad to raid it, we lost contact.
According to life detection feedback, they are still alive. Or perhaps not truly alive, but controlled now.
We have no good way to deal with this and can only sacrifice this squad. Captain, eliminate everyone alive in the site.
Note: Some members of this squad were issued Triton ammo magazines, so be very careful.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsm_combat_aria: Next time you pass by, Europa will be rid of us.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_aria: Mission failed. Our headquarters have sent a more elite squad to eliminate the threat.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsm_combat_aria: I am like a rotting corpse, lonely and helpless.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_aria: The sun has risen, and the darkness remains behind, but the sun is not ours; we must sleep.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_adventists_save: We have located Miss Qiu, who has been kidnapped to [location1]. Judging by the decorations, it appears to be the work of the Adventists. We need to rescue Miss Qiu and safely deliver her to a TSM station, ensuring her safety at all costs.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsm_adventists_save: Mission complete. We will take over the escort from here.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_adventists_save: As she left, she kept looking back, seemingly trying to remember your face.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_advisers: Our forces have recently noticed anomalies in combat against the separatists: the enemy's tactics show significant targeted characteristics, and their strategic patterns closely match the tactical systems encountered by the Coalition forces in past TSM campaigns. After tactical analysis, it is confirmed that military advisors from TSM are involved in guiding the separatists' actions. According to the latest intelligence, the target building not only gathers TSM feline military advisors but also stations a large number of elite separatist combat units. The mission this time is to completely eliminate the enemy's command center and primarily annihilate all feline advisors.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_advisers: All the stars tonight will drown in the water.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_advisers: Obstacles and bullets, used by the enemy to block our way, we laugh them off and then march through defiantly.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_adventists: Based on the information obtained from the thieves last time, they are now likely working with the Adventists. We can use this opportunity to take them all down. This time, we will send a squad to raid the site with you, and they have already been arranged. Once you start the operation, they will coordinate with you.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_adventists: Actions that should have been taken, repeatedly delayed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_adventists: Our first joint raid on the site went well. Let's hope for better coordination next time.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_nz: Some individuals with exceptional marksmanship have taken over this site. Each of them wields a hand cannon, eager for a fair duel.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_nz: The first shot declares my arrival; the second shot announces your death.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_nz: The bullet pierced through the brain. In a daze, he seemed to stand on a stage, seeing the audience in complete darkness, yet he could clearly hear two people speaking. “Who is playing on this stage?” one voice questioned. Another voice replied, “The person on stage seems clumsy yet moves with ease. If he is not playing the fool, then he must be the king.” As soon as the words were spoken, applause erupted from the audience, and a joyful symphony began to play. Ladies and gentlemen, this is the end of Solomon.

Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostrescu: According to reliable intelligence, a mercenary group has kidnapped a well-known business leader in the [location1] area and established a temporary stronghold. The family of the kidnapped individual has commissioned our organization to conduct a tactical rescue operation, with the primary objective of safely extracting the target person.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostrescue2: We have successfully rescued the hostages.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostrescue2: The hostages are all on board. Time to return and report.
Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostrescu: Confirmed by frontline reconnaissance, a mercenary squad of about one company size has conducted a pinpoint destruction at [location1] and kidnapped several hostages. They are now using the safety of the hostages as leverage to extort a high protection fee from nearby sites. After tactical assessment, the armed group has the capability for rapid maneuver and strike, threatening to continue destroying facilities along the supply line if their demands are not met. The affected facility has reached a strategic cooperation agreement with the captain and commissioned a special rescue operation.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostrescue3: We have successfully rescued the hostages.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostrescue3: The hostages are all on board. Time to return and report.

infotexts.tsm_escort_lm: The situation has changed. Everyone, drop your weapons and surrender. We need to requisition this ship for military use.
infotexts.tsm.hd.mc1: This gift is for all the captains still fighting.
